title: President pays tribute to Armed Forces for successful anti-terror operation in Lakki Marwat
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 04 (APP): President Asif Ali Zardari on Wednesday paid tribute to the security forces for their successful operation against Fitnat-ul-Khawarij in Lakki Marwat, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa.
The president praised the security forces for killing five terrorists and injuring two others during the operation, according to a President House press release.
He expressed national resolve to continue operation against terrorists until complete eradication of terrorism.
